```{python}
from tvbo.export import experiment
from tvbo.knowledge.simulation import localdynamics
maith = localdynamics.load_model_from_file(
    "/Users/leonmartin_bih/projects/TVB-O/tvbo-multiscale/models/MaithEtAlCortexExcInh.yaml"
)

exp = experiment.SimulationExperiment(
    model={'name':'JansenRit'},
    connectivity={"parcellation": {"atlas": {"name": "DesikanKilliany"}}},
    integration={
        "method": "Heun",
        "step_size": 0.01,
        "noise": {"parameters": {"sigma": {"value": 0.0001}}},
    },
)

# exp = SimulationExperiment()
res1 = exp.run(format="jax", jit=False, enable_x64=True)
```
